mapper.select: SELECT tp.progress_no , tp.member_no , progress_rate , DATE_FORMAT(regist_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') as regist_dt , progress_content , progress_title , progress_participant , DATE_FORMAT(study_period,'%Y-%m-%d') as study_period FROM tb_progress tp INNER JOIN tb_member tm ON tp.member_no = tm.member_no

SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rownum ,ts.study_title ,tsd.study_detail_content ,tsp.participant_nm ,tsp.participant_check_status FROM tb_study ts INNER JOIN tb_study_detail tsd ON ts.study_no = tsd.study_no INNER JOIN tb_study_participant tsp ON tsd.study_detail_no = tsp.study_datail_no INNER JOIN (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) rownum WHERE tsp.participant_nm = "고용수" ORDER BY rownum

SELECT ts.study_no ,ts.study_title FROM tb_study ts INNER JOIN tb_study_detail tsd ON ts.study_no = tsd.study_no INNER JOIN tb_study_participant tsp ON tsd.study_detail_no = tsp.study_datail_no WHERE tsp.participant_nm = "고용수" GROUP BY ts.study_title ORDER BY study_no

SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rownum ,ts.study_title ,tsd.study_detail_content ,tsp.participant_nm ,tsp.participant_check_status FROM tb_study ts INNER JOIN tb_study_detail tsd ON ts.study_no = tsd.study_no INNER JOIN tb_study_participant tsp ON tsd.study_detail_no = tsp.study_datail_no INNER JOIN (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) rownum WHERE tsp.participant_nm = "고용수" AND ts.study_title = #{study_title} ORDER BY rownum

SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS rownum ,tsp.participant_nm ,tsp.participant_check_status FROM tb_study ts INNER JOIN tb_study_detail tsd ON ts.study_no = tsd.study_no INNER JOIN tb_study_participant tsp ON tsd.study_detail_no = tsp.study_datail_no INNER JOIN (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) rownum WHERE tsp.participant_nm = "고용수" ORDER BY rownum
